title: Lucy and Desi
description:
Tig and Cheryl take on another legendary comedic duo, Lucy and Desi... aka Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz, of "I Love Lucy" fame! Our doc duo share their associations with the show, plus a BIG surprise at... some point in the episode. You'll have to listen to find out! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
